Policy: Acuerdo Nº 569/07 - Modifica el Acuerdo Nº 1.039/93, que reglamenta el título VI del Decreto Nº 31/92, Ley para la modernización y el desarrollo del sector agrícola.

Policy: Regulation on land cadastre.
Policy_Content: This Regulation prescribes the manner of keeping the register of land parcels in the transitional period and the manner of its gradual adjustment when part of the Croatian national real estate cadastre.
Subject: Land & soil

Policy: Radiation Protection Regulations.
Policy_Content: These Regulations implement the Radiation Protection Act by prescribing matters in relation to the content of radiation protection plans, the monitoring and recording of personal radiation exposure on mining sites, offences, infringement notices for infringement offences, and to fees payable under the Act.
Subject: Air & atmosphere
Geographical_area: ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Australia and New Zealand, Indian Ocean, Oceania, South Pacific
Entry into force notes: These Regulations enter into force on 5 October 2009.

Policy: Goa Agricultural Produce Marketing (Development and Regulation) Act, 2007 (Goa Act No. 11 of 2007).
Policy_Content: The Act, consisting of 84 sections divided into twelve Chapters and one Schedule, provides for improved regulation in marketing of agricultural produce, development of efficient marketing system, promotion of agricultural processing and export. It also aims at establishing and managing markets for agricultural produce and to put in place an effective infrastructure for marketing of agricultural produce within the State of Goa. In particular, it specifies that upon a representation made by any person or local authority or by the growers of any agricultural produce within the area for which a market is proposed to be established, the Government or the person appointed by the Government as the State Marketing Officer, may, by notification in the Official Gazette declare his/her intention of developing and regulating the marketing of such agricultural produce. The Government shall establish the Goa Agricultural Marketing Board which shall have powers and functions as specified int this Act.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Indian Ocean, South Asian Seas, Southern Asia

Policy: Arrêté du 31 juillet 2007 relatif aux modalités de délégation des missions de gestion des ressources génétiques assurées par les instituts techniques nationaux.
Policy_Content: La demande d'autorisation de délégation mentionnée à l'article R. 653-29 du code rural  est adressée au ministère chargé de l'agriculture (DGPEI/SPM/SDEPA/BGA). Elle mentionne toutes les espèces concernées par la délégation envisagée (nom scientifique en latin [genre et espèce], suivi de la dénomination usuelle en français). Cette demande est accompagnée d'un descriptif précis des actions que l'institut entend confier au candidat à la délégation, et du projet de convention mentionné au troisième alinéa de l'article R. 653-29. Le ministre chargé de l'agriculture autorise la délégation pour une durée de cinq ans renouvelable expressément, après avis de la Commission nationale d'amélioration génétique. Cette autorisation est subordonnée à la capacité du candidat à la délégation à contribuer, sur le long terme, à l'amélioration et à la gestion des ressources zoogénétiques concernées, compte tenu, notamment, de son expérience en matière de gestion des ressources zoogénétiques.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Livestock
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Mediterranean, North Atlantic, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe

Policy: Resolution No. 486 of 2007 defining requirements and rules for the estimation of the leasing value of the agricultural mud.
Policy_Content: The aim of this Resolution is to regulate the estimation of the leasing value of the agricultural mud. It is composed of 3 articles. Article 1 deals with requirements and rules for the estimation of the leasing value of agricultural mud which are: estimation of the annual rent of agricultural lands; kind of soil; fertility level; irrigation methods; distances between lands and houses; kind of crops; Fadden rent average and the like. Article 2 entrusts the Estimation Committees to start their function on 1 July 2007.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Keyword: Agricultural land,Less favoured areas,Soil conservation/soil improvement
Geographical_area: Africa, Mediterranean, Middle East, NEAR EAST AND NORTH AFRICA, Northern Africa, Red Sea  Gulf of Aden
Entry into force notes: This Resolution enters into force on 1 July 2007

Policy: Market Organization Act 2007.
Policy_Content: The purpose of the present Act is to ensure an efficient implementation of the common market organization in Austria with a view to consumer protection and animal welfare. The text consists of 35 articles divided into 4 Parts as follows: General provisions (1); Provisions on organization of market (2); Common provisions (3); Penalties and final provisions (4).
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Livestock, Food & nutrition

The Decree-Law defines IGAOT’s mission, functions and internal structure.

Policy: Ley Nº 3.720 - Participación de la Corporación Minera de Bolivia en la cadena productiva.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley dispone, derogando lo establecido por el artículo 91 del Código de Minería, que la Corporación Minera de Bolivia participará de manera directa en la cadena productiva, ejerciendo las siguientes funciones: prospección y exploración; explotación; concentración; fundición y refinación; comercialización de minerales y metales; administración de las áreas fiscales.

Policy: Ley de asentamientos humanos, desarrollo urbano y ordenamiento territorial del Estado de Hidalgo.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley establece las normas conforme a las cuales el Estado de Hidalgo y los Municipios, a través de las autoridades competentes, ejercerán sus atribuciones en materia de planeación urbana, asentamientos humanos, desarrollo urbano y ordenamiento territorial para planear y regular la fundación, conservación, mejoramiento y crecimiento de los asentamientos humanos en la Entidad. Asimismo se introducen las bases mediante las cuales se integrará el Sistema Estatal de Ordenamiento Territorial y Desarrollo Urbano. El objetivo último es mejorar la calidad de vida de la población urbana y rural, preservar los recursos naturales y proteger el medio ambiente.
Subject: Environment gen., Land & soil
Geographical_area: Americas, Central America, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North Atlantic, North Pacific, North-East Pacific

Policy: Law No. 102 on state subsidies to producers of agricultural commodities.
Policy_Content: This Law establishes that for the period of agricultural labour producers of agricultural commodities shall be exonerated from payment of customs dues, taxes and dues for fuel and lubricants from state reserves requested for field work by the producers of agricultural commodities.

Policy: Regional Law No. 80-PK “On modalities and rates of procurement of timber by citizens for individual personal needs”.
Policy_Content: This Regional Law establishes the modalities and rates of timber extraction by citizens for individual personal needs (construction and repairs of residential facilities, fuelwood for heating and other needs) in accordance with purchase and sale contract of forest species without allotment of forest plots. The aforesaid contract shall be concluded by citizens and authorized regional state forest management institution. Timber procurement by citizens shall be performed in the form of clear cutting and selective cutting.
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: National Environmental Standards and Regulations Enforcement Agency (Establishment) Act, 2007 (No. 25 of 2007).
Policy_Content: This Act establishes the National Environmental Standards and Regulations Enforcement Agency as a body corporate and provides rules relative to the protection of the environment in Nigeria. The Agency shall be responsible for the effective enforcement of standards, Regulations and all national agreements and international agreements on environment to which Nigeria is a signatory. The Agency shall be governed by a Governing Council established by this Act. The Agency shall also, among other things: (a) enforce compliance with laws, guidelines, policies and standards on specific environmental matters; and (b) coordinate and liaise with stakeholders, within and outside Nigeria, on matters of environmental standards, regulations and enforcement.
Subject: Environment gen., Sea, Water
Keyword: Framework law,Basic legislation,Institution,Environmental planning,Pollution control,Air quality/air pollution,Climate change,Marine pollution,Emissions,Enforcement/compliance,Erosion,Hazardous waste,International agreement-implementation,Monitoring,Noise pollution,Ozone layer,Freshwater quality/freshwater pollution,Soil pollution/quality,Transboundary effects,Effluent waste water/discharge,Basin/catchment/watershed,Water quality standards

Policy: Arrêté n°2007-0645/PR/MHUEAT modifiant et complétant l'Arrêté n°73-1580/SG/CG du 31 octobre 1973 portant organisation de la procédure d'instruction et de délivrance du Permis de construire.
Policy_Content: Aucune construction à usage d'habitation ou non ne peut être édifiée sans un Permis de Construire Ordinaire délivré dans les conditions indiquées par le présent décret. Ces dispositions s'appliquent à toutes les constructions édifiées en matériaux définitifs sur un terrain domanial inscrit au livre foncier du territoire. Le Permis de construire est exigé pour les travaux exécutés sur les constructions existantes, lorsqu'ils ont pour effet d'en changer la destination, de modifier leur aspect extérieur ou leur volume ou de créer des niveaux supplémentaires. Une autorisation est également requise pour toutes les constructions militaires non couvertes par le secret de la défense nationale.
Subject: Land & soil

Entry into force notes: These Measures enter into force on 27 July 2007.

Policy: Measures of Shanxi province for implementation of the Interim Regulations of the People's Republic of China on Urban and Town Land Use Tax.
Policy_Content: These Measures are formulated in accordance with the Interim Regulations of the People’s Republic of China on Urban and Town Land Use Tax. The Text, consisting of 14 articles, provides for the rules and procedures relevant to the urban and town land use tax to be satisfied within the administrative area of Shanxi province.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, East Asian Seas, Eastern Asia, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: These Measures enter into force on 27 July 2007.

Policy: Prevention of Steep Slope Disasters Act.
Policy_Content: The purpose of this Act is to protect lives and property of people from the danger of steep slope failures and to contribute to public welfare by prescribing matters concerning the designation and management of steep slopes at risk of collapse, the formulation and execution of necessary improvement plans and emergency measures. For the purpose of the present Act the term "steep slope" means a steep slope prescribed by Presidential Decree, which is a natural slope or artificial slope (including a retaining wall and an embankment) attached to a housing site, road, railroad or park facility or a mountainous region adjacent thereto). The text consists of 37 articles.
Subject: Environment gen., Land & soil
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, East Asian Seas, Eastern Asia, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Gas (Gas Transporter’s Licence) Exemption) (No.2) Order.
Policy_Content: This Order specifies the exemption of licensing for gas transporters with respect to specified companies and subject to the conditions outlined therein by the Energy Market Authority.
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, East Asian Seas, Small Island Developing States, South-Eastern Asia

Policy: Law No. 310-III ZRK on state registration of immovable property and related transactions.
Policy_Content: This Law establishes the purpose, obligations and legal grounds regarding the registration of immovable property and related transactions. The following rights to immovable property shall be subject to state registration: (a) ownership; (b) economic management; (c) operating management; (d) land tenure of at least one year; and (e) servitude for a period of no less than one year. The following pre-emptive rights shall not require mandatory state registration: (a) land tenure for a period less than one year; and (b) servitude for a period less than one year. The Act consists of seven sections as follows: (1) general provisions; (2) legal register; (3) state technical inspection of edifices, constructions and elements thereof; (4) state registration of immovable property and related transactions; (5) state registration of certain rights; (6) systematic recording in legal registers; and (7) dispute settlement and final provisions.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Aral Sea, Caspian Sea, Central Asia, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Landlocked Developing Countries, North Asia
Entry into force notes: This Law enters into force ten days after the date of its official publication.

Policy: Regulation of the Minister of Energy and Mineral Resources No. 006/2007 on technical guidance for the application of professional competency in the mineral and coal mining sector.
Policy_Content: The purpose of this Regulation is to standardize professional competency in managing human resources in the mineral and coal mining sector in order to facilitate the implementation of mineral and coal mining businesses.
Subject: Mineral resources
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, East Asian Seas, Indian Ocean, South-Eastern Asia
Entry into force notes: This Regulation enters into force on the date of its stipulation.

Policy: Orden ITC/2370/2007 - Regula la demanda de interrumpibilidad para los consumidores que adquieren su energía en el mercado de producción.
Policy_Content: La presente Orden regula el servicio de gestión de la demanda de interrumpibilidad para los consumidores que adquieren su energía en el mercado de producción, que consiste en reducir la potencia activa demandada hasta el valor de la potencia residual requerida, en respuesta a una orden de reducción de potencia dada por el Operador del Sistema en los términos establecidos en la presente Orden y en el contrato que se formalice entre éste y aquél.
Subject: Energy
Keyword: Energy conservation/energy production,Transport/storage,Internal trade,Royalties/fees,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Mediterranean, North Atlantic, North-East Atlantic, Southern Europe

Policy: Presidential Decree No. 351 concerning some issues of hydrometeorological activity.
Policy_Content: The scope of this Presidential Decree shall be to prevent dangerous hydrometeorological phenomena and disasters and provision with hydrometeorological information. It establishes terms and conditions for carrying out activities related to active impact upon meteorological and other geophysical processes, and also the issuance of permits for carrying out the aforesaid activities to the authorized organizations. The Government shall be authorized to involve also international organizations in the aforesaid activities. Relations between the state and the organizations authorized to carry out active impact upon meteorological and other geophysical processes shall be regulated on contractual basis. All issued permits for carrying out activities related to active impact upon meteorological and other geophysical processes shall be registered in log file. The authorize organization shall supply information and data subject to registration in log file.
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA
Entry into force notes: This Presidential Decree enters into force on the date of its official publication.

Policy: Regulation No. 9/2007 approving the National Policy for the Forestry sector.
Policy_Content: This Regulation, consisting of 5 Chapters, establishes the requirements to be met in order to perform activities in the forestry sector. It specifies forest protecting measures and forest and land management criteria. Forest protection, including water basin conservation, contributes to improve the sustainable development of the agricultural sector and the food security of poor rural households.
Subject: Forestry, Water, Wild species & ecosystems
Keyword: Forest management/forest conservation,Forestry protection measures,Agricultural development,Agro-forestry,Authorization/permit,Inland waters,Freshwater resources management,Water conservation zone,Protection forest,Protection of habitats,Protection of species
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Indian Ocean, Least Developed Countries, Small Island Developing States, South-Eastern Asia

Policy: Pollution Prevention and Control (Designation of Directives) (England and Wales) Order 2007 (S.I. No. 2247 of 2007).
Policy_Content: This Order designates certain Community Directives of the Council or the European Parliament and of the Council as relevant Directives for the purposes of paragraph 20(2)(c) of Schedule 1 to the Pollution Prevention and Control Act 1999. Schedule 1 specifies regulation-making powers of the competent authority for England and Wales in relation with particular purposes for which provision may be made under section 2 of the Act. The Directives principally concern waste and emissions.
Subject: Air & atmosphere, Waste & hazardous substances
Geographical_area: Atlantic Ocean Islands, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Atlantic, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Northern Europe

Policy: Devolution of Estates Act, 2007 (No. 21 of 2007).
Policy_Content: This Act makes provision with respect to intestate succession and succession by will of estates including land and land-related rights. The Act sets out rules relative to inheritance and related distribution of estates in the case a person dies without having made a will. The Act also defines offences against persons entitled to inheritance or related to the deceased person.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, Least Developed Countries, North Atlantic, Western Africa

Policy: Regional Law No. 1500-OD “On fixation of land buy-back price in case of allotment in ownership of agricultural land plots for gardening, horticulture and subsistence farming”.
Policy_Content: This Regional Law regulates transfer of agricultural land parcels in ownership to gardeners, vegetable growers and subsistence farmers, and to non-commercial associations thereof, out of stock of public and municipal land, except for cases of transfer free of charge envisaged by the national legislation. Buy-out price shall be fixed at 20 percent of cadastre value for agricultural land and 10 percent of cadastre value for urban land.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Regional law enters into force on the date of its official publication.

Policy: Regulation on data to be provided by energy sector subjects to the Ministry.
Policy_Content: This Regulation establishes the content, manner and deadlines with regard to the submitting of data which energy undertakings performing activities of import and/or production of oil and/or petroleum products and/or biofuels and energy undertakings performing activities of wholesale and/or retail sale of petroleum products and/or biofuels are obliged to submit to the competent Croatian Ministry for the purpose of energy planning and mandatory reporting, data collection and financial aspects.
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Mediterranean, Southern Europe
Entry into force notes: This Regulation enters into force eight days after its publication in the Official Gazette.

Policy: Regional Law No. 694-OZ “On exceptional cases of timber extraction in accordance with purchase and sale contract of forest species”.
Policy_Content: This Regional Law establishes exceptional cases of timber extraction in accordance with purchase and sale contract of forest species by citizens and legal persons in accordance with purchase and sale contract of forest species. It envisages the following exceptional case of timber extraction: (a) for public and municipal needs, including fuelwood for heating and building timber for urgent repairs of public edifices; and (c) related to procurement of fir trees (spruces) and other coniferous forest species for New Year festivities.
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Regional Law enters into force 10 days after the date of its official publication.

Policy: Forest Fire Protection Regulations of Zhejiang Procince.
Policy_Content: These Regulations, consisting of 50 articles, are formulated  for the purposes of effectively preventing and extinguishing forest fire, reducing the forest fire hazard, protecting the forest resources and maintaining the ecological security. The Regulations are divided into 8 Chapters: General Provisions (I); Forest Fire Protection Organizations (II); Forest Fire Prevention (III);   Forest Fire Extinguishing  and Rescue (IV); Safeguards (V); Supervision and Inspection (VI); Legal Responsibility (VII); Supplementary Provisions (VIII).
Subject: Forestry
Keyword: Forestry protection measures,Forest fires,Disasters,Policy/planning,Inspection,Institution,Offences/penalties,Research,Data collection/reporting,Forest management/forest conservation
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, East Asian Seas, Eastern Asia, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Governmental Decree No. 908-N validating the Regulation on the Commission for registration of pesticides and agrochemicals.
Policy_Content: This Governmental Decree validates the Regulation on the Commission for registration of pesticides and agrochemicals operating in the field of phytosanitary. The scope of the Commission shall be the approval of the list of pesticides and agrochemicals and submittal of the report on registration thereof to the competent authority. The Commission shall base its decision related to registration on expertise and shall examine the impact of pesticides and agrochemicals on human health and environment, refusing registration of pesticides and agrochemicals with adverse effects on human health and environment.
Subject: Environment gen., Land & soil, Cultivated plants
Geographical_area: Asia, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Landlocked Developing Countries, Western Asia
Entry into force notes: This Governmental Decree enters into force on 23 August 2007.

Policy: Roads (Environmental Impact Assessment) Regulations (Northern Ireland) 2007 (S.R. No. 346 of 2007).
Policy_Content: These Regulations define procedures for the environmental impact assessment of projects for the construction or improvement of roads. For this purpose they amend the Roads (Northern Ireland) Order 1993. The Regulations, among other things, define for Northern Ireland public hearing requirements of Article 3 of the Council Directive 85/337/EEC on the assessment of the effects of certain public and private projects on the environment.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Atlantic Ocean Islands, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Atlantic, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Northern Europe

Policy: Decreto Nº 498 - Modifica el Decreto Nº 419, que establece veda total de corto plazo para las especies forestales del bosque nativo.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto modifica el que establece en todo el territorio del Ecuador continental la veda total de corto plazo de seis meses para las especies forestales del bosque nativo, introduciendo precisiones que permitan su adecuada instrumentación y disminuyan los efectos negativos que pudiere ocasionar especialmente a los usuarios menos favorecidos del recurso forestal.
Subject: Forestry
Keyword: Forest management/forest conservation,Forestry protection measures,Timber extraction/logging,Fuelwood
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Ley Nº 26.270 - Promoción del desarrollo y producción de la biotecnología moderna.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley tiene por objeto el marco normativo para promover el desarrollo y la producción de la biotecnología moderna. A tal efecto, la Ley establece los beneficios de los que pueden gozar las personas físicas o jurídicas constituidas en la República Argentina que presenten proyectos de investigación, aplicación o ejecución de biotecnología moderna que cumplan con los criterios de elegibilidad previstos. Asimismo, crea el Fondo de Estímulo a Nuevos Emprendimientos en Biotecnología Moderna, destinado a financiar aportes de capital inicial de nuevos pequeños emprendedores, que no se encuentren en condiciones de acceder a los beneficios contemplados en las presentes disposiciones. En lo referente al marco institucional, cabe destacar la creación de la Comisión Consultiva para la Promoción de la Biotecnología Moderna.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Environment gen., Food & nutrition, Cultivated plants
Geographical_area: Americas, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America, South Atlantic

Policy: Measures for the Administration of Environmental Surveillance.
Policy_Content: These Measures aim at strengthening the administration of the following environmental surveillance activities: environmental quality surveillance; supervisory surveillance of pollution sources; environmental pollution emergency response surveillance; etc
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, East Asian Seas, Eastern Asia, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: These Measures enter into force on 1 September 2007.

Policy: Order No. 238-p of the Minister of Environmental Protection validating the Regulation on access to ecological information related to environmental impact assessment of the projected economic activity.
Policy_Content: This Order determines the contents and the modalities of access to ecological information related to to environmental impact assessment of the projected economic activity of all natural and legal persons concerned united in social associations and participation thereof in the process of decision-making related to projected economic activities. Information related to environmental impact assessment of the projected activity shall contain the following: (a) environmental impact assessment (EIA) draft; (b) conclusions of external experts; (c) public hearing protocol; (d) written requests of the persons concerned related to EIA draft; and (e) conclusions of state environmental audit. Initiator of the projected economic activity shall publish information of the official web-site of the Ministry of Environmental Protection containing the following data: (a) name, legal address, location, telephone number of the initiator of economic activity; (b) the beginning and the period of carrying out state environmental audit; and (c) name, address, telephone number of state body carrying out state environmental audit.
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Aral Sea, Caspian Sea, Central Asia, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Landlocked Developing Countries, North Asia

Policy: Ley Nº 1152 - Dicta el Estatuto de Desarrollo Rural y reforma el Instituto Colombiano de Desarrollo Rural (INCODER). (Declarada Inexequible).
Policy_Content: La presente Ley dicta el Estatuto de Desarrollo Rural, que contiene el conjunto sistemático e integrado de principios, objetivos, normas, lineamientos de política, mecanismos y procedimientos a través de los cuales el Estado promoverá y ejecutará las acciones orientadas a lograr un desarrollo humano sostenible y el bienestar del sector rural, en condiciones de equidad, competitividad y sostenibilidad. Asimismo, se crea el Sistema Nacional de Desarrollo Rural, integrado por los organismos y entidades del sector central, descentralizado, territorial, y por organismos de carácter privado que realicen actividades relacionadas con los objetivos de la Ley y como mecanismo obligatorio de planeación, coordinación, ejecución y evaluación de las actividades dirigidas a mejorar el ingreso y calidad de vida de los habitantes del sector rural.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Keyword: Institution,Agricultural development,Less favoured areas,Policy/planning,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings,Land reform,Credit,Financial agricultural measures,Gender,Smallholders/peasants,Indigenous peoples
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North-East Pacific, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Acuerdo Nº 4/07 - Exoneraciones para las actividades de la industria eléctrica.
Policy_Content: El presente Acuerdo hace efectivas las exoneraciones para las actividades de la industria eléctrica, para aquellos agentes económicos del sector eléctrico que hayan suscrito con el Estado un contrato de licencia y/o concesión.
Subject: Energy
Keyword: Energy conservation/energy production,Renewable energy,Hydropower generation,Non-governmental entity,Subsidy/incentive,Contract/agreement,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings
Geographical_area: Americas, Central America, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North-East Pacific

Policy: Capital Allowances (Environmentally Beneficial Plant and Machinery) (Amendment) Order 2007 (S.I. No. 2166 of 2007).
Policy_Content: This Order amends the Capital Allowances (Environmentally Beneficial Plant and Machinery)  Order 2003 by adding three technology classes to the Water Technology Product  List. It also gives new definitions of “the Water Technology Criteria List” and “the Water  Technology Product List”.
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Atlantic Ocean Islands, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Atlantic, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Northern Europe

Policy: Law on noise protection (Sarajevo Canton).
Policy_Content: This Law determines the permissible noise levels, noise protection measures and way of measuring noise; noise level limits, health protection issues; supervision of the implementation of this Law, as well as other issues of importance for noise protection (on the territory of the Sarajevo Canton).
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Mediterranean, Southern Europe
Entry into force notes: This Law enters into force eight days after its publication in the Official Gazette.

Policy: Regulation No. 486 date 25.7.2007 suspending the processing operations of the ships that transport oil, gas, and their by-products at the ports of Durres and Shengjini.
Policy_Content: The Regulation suspends all processing operations conducted by the ships that transport oil, gas and their by-products in the ports of Durres and Shengjini within 18 months from the date of the Regulation’s entry into force. The processing activities in other ports will continue as approved.
Subject: Energy, Sea
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Mediterranean, Southern Europe
Entry into force notes: This Regulation enters into force after its publication in the Official Gazette.

Policy: Decree No. 963 of the Cabinet of Ministers validating the Methodology for calculation of the amount of damage caused by unauthorized occupation of land plots, not for intended purposeful use thereof, and removal of soil cover (fertile soil layer) without special authorization.
Policy_Content: This Methodology is aimed at calculation of the amount of damage caused to the state, territorial communities, legal entities and natural persons, applicable to all categories of land caused by unauthorized occupation of land plots, not for intended purposeful use thereof, and removal of soil cover (fertile soil layer) without special authorization unauthorized occupation of land, use of land for other purposes, removal of soil (fertile soil layer) without special permission. The amount of damage is determined separately for each of the aforesaid offences. The amount of damage does not include the cost of: (a) demolition of houses, buildings and structures that are spontaneously constructed or are being built on arbitrarily occupied land plots or on land plots not allocated in the prescribed manner for this purpose; (b) bringing land into a condition suitable for the  further use thereof for its intended purpose; and (c) reclamation of disturbed lands. The Decree establishes calculation formula.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Black Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA

Policy: Federal Law No. 217-FZ amending Federal Law No. 201-FZ implementing the Forest Code.
Policy_Content: Article 4 shall be supplemented with item 4.1 of the following wording: “Citizens can be allotted plots of public forest without state registration thereof until 1 January 2010. The modalities of the state registration of the plots of forest within forest estate shall be established by the authorized federal forest institution.” Article 14 shall be supplemented with item 14.1 of the following wording: “It shall be prohibited to allot forest plots pertaining to public or municipal property without specification of the type and amount of forest management in accordance with forest management plan after 1 January 2009.”
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Federal Law enters into force on the date of its official publication except for items 3 and 7 of the Article 1.

Policy: Federal Law No. 221-FZ on state cadastre of immovable property.
Policy_Content: This Federal Law regulates relations dealing with state cadastre registration of immovable property, including plots of land. It shall not be applicable to subsoil. State cadastre data shall be for permanent storage and destruction or removal of the whole database or part thereof shall be prohibited. The Act consists of five Sections divided into 48 articles: (1) general provisions; (2) keeping state cadastre of immovable property; (3) modalities of immovable property registration; (4) qualification for carrying out cadastre activity; (4) conclusive provisions. The following data regarding plots of land shall be recorded in state cadastre: (a) description of the plot of land; (b) cadastre number and the date of registration; (c) mapping; (d) location; and (e) area. The following documentation shall be required for state cadastre registration: (a) state dues payment recipe; (b) surveying plan; (c) application; (d) land certificate attesting applicant’s rights to the plot of land; and (e) land classification certificate.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: The Federal Law enters into force on 1 March 2008 except for part 4 of the article 4 and part 6 of the article 47.

Policy: Règlement grand-ducal modifiant les annexes I et II du règlement grand-ducal modifié du 7 mars 2003 concernant l’évaluation des incidences de certains projets publics et privés sur l’environnement.
Policy_Content: Le present règlement grand-ducal modifie le règlement grand-ducal du 7 mars 2003 concernant l’évaluation des incidences de certains projets publics et privés sur l’environnement. A l’annexe I du règlement susvisé le numéro courant 7. est supprimé; à l’annexe II du meme règlement: le numéro courant 10.c) est supprimé; le numéro courant 10.d) est supprimé; et le numéro courant 10.h) est supprimé. Le texte comprend 3 articles.
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Benelux, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe

Policy: Decreto Supremo Nº 041/07/EM - Modifica el Reglamento de la Ley especial que regula el otorgamiento de concesiones mineras en áreas urbanas y de expansión urbana.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto Supremo modifica el Reglamento de la Ley especial que regula el otorgamiento de concesiones mineras en áreas urbanas y de expansión urbana, en relación a la identificación de las áreas materia de ordenanza municipal.
Subject: Mineral resources
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Energy Saving Ordinance.
Policy_Content: The present Ordinance implements various articles of the Energy Saving Act of 1 September 2005 (BGBl. I p. 2684). The Ordinance lays down comprehensive provisions relating to the saving of energy in existing buildings and in buildings to be constructed. High thermal insulation technology shall contribute to residential energy saving. The text consists of 31 articles divided into 7 Parts as follows: General provisions (I); Buildings to be constructed (II); Existing buildings and facilities (III); Facilities for heating, cool air and ventilation technology, as well as of warm water supply (IV); Energy certification and recommendations for the improvement of energy efficiency (V); Common provisions, penalties (VI); Final provisions (VII). Eleven Annexes are enclosed.
Subject: Air & atmosphere, Energy
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe
Entry into force notes: The present Ordinance enters into force on 1 October 2007.

Policy: Ley Nº 1151 - Plan Nacional de Desarrollo, 2006-2010: Estado Comunitario, desarrollo para todos.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley expide el Plan nacional de desarrollo 2006-2010 que, a partir de los logros obtenidos durante el período 2002-2006 en seguridad, confianza, desarrollo económico y equidad social, el Plan nacional de desarrollo 2006-2010 tendrá como orientación básica consolidar y continuar las directrices del Plan 2002-2006 pero con particular énfasis y prioridad en dos objetivos fundamentales: mantener el crecimiento económico alcanzado recientemente y complementarlo con una noción más amplia de desarrollo.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, North-East Pacific, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Subsidies Guidelines on energy and climate protection - Energy and Climate Protection Guidelines.
Policy_Content: The present Guidelines lay down provisions relating to the granting of public funding for projects increasing energy efficiency, use of renewable energy, development of innovative energy technology and climate and emissions protection. Article 3 lists potential beneficiaries for such subsidies and article 4 outlines the necessary conditions. The text consists of 8 articles and 1 Annex.
Subject: Air & atmosphere, Energy
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe
Entry into force notes: The present Guidelines have entered into force on 1 January 2007.

Policy: Ordinance of the Land government on competences under the Atomic Energy Act.
Policy_Content: The present Ordinance implements the Atomic Energy Act of 15 July 1985 ((BGBl. I p. 1565). In particular, the Ordinance lays down provisions relating to transfer of power to authorities in Baden-Württemberg responsible for the enforcement of the afore-mentioned Federal Act. The text consists of 3 articles.
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe

Policy: Regional Law No. 110 “On composition, elaboration and modification of land-use planning scheme”.
Policy_Content: This Regional Law determines composition, elaboration and modification of the regional land-use planning scheme. Land-use planning project shall include regulations on territorial planning and mapping of objects projected for location, description and characteristics of land areas and names of urban, municipal districts and inhabited areas. Monitoring of land-use planning schemes shall include state of environment and environmental protection arrangements.
Subject: Environment gen., Land & soil
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: This Regional Law enters into force on the date of its official publication.

Policy: Arrêté n° 32 du 24 juillet 2007 portant création, attributions, organisation et fonctionnement du Comité de pilotage national du Programme de Restructuration et mise à niveau de l'industrie des Etats membres de l’UEMOA.
Policy_Content: Le présent arrêté crée comité de pilotage national du programme de restructuration et de mise à-niveau de l’industrie des Etats membres de I'UEMOA. Le comité de pilotage national du programme de restructuration et de mise à niveau de l'industrie des Etats membres de l'UEMOA est chargé d'assurer la gestion stratégique du programme  vise la relance de la production industrielle, la promotion de l’investissement, de l’emploi et l’amélioration de la compétitivité des économies aux niveaux régional et international.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development, Livestock, Fisheries, Forestry, Cultivated plants, Water
Geographical_area: Africa, AFRICA FAO, North Atlantic, Western Africa

Policy: Energy Saving Ordinance.
Policy_Content: The present Ordinance implements various articles of the Energy Saving Act of 1 September 2005 (BGBl. I p. 2684). The Ordinance lays down comprehensive provisions relating to the saving of energy in existing buildings and in buildings to be constructed. High thermal insulation technology shall contribute to residential energy saving. The text consists of 31 articles divided into 7 Parts as follows: General provisions (I); Buildings to be constructed (II); Existing buildings and facilities (III); Facilities for heating, cool air and ventilation technology, as well as of warm water supply (IV); Energy certification and recommendations for the improvement of energy efficiency (V); Common provisions, penalties (VI); Final provisions (VII). Eleven Annexes are enclosed.
Subject: Air & atmosphere, Energy

Policy: Regional Law No. 109 “On Civic Chamber”.
Policy_Content: This Regional Law establishes that Civic Chamber must ensure coordination between citizens, social associations, state bodies and local government, promotion of civil society institutions, and consideration of the interests of the population in the process of elaboration and realization of state policy, protection of rights and freedoms of citizens. Civic Chamber shall be set up to ensure open and transparent discussion of the most important problems of social development, promotion of civil society institutions and democratic principles of the functioning of state bodies. Civic Chamber shall perform the following tasks: (a) involvement of citizens and associations thereof into formation and implementation of state policy; (b) support of civil initiatives aimed at realization of the constitutional rights of citizens; (c) performance of public expertise of federal legislation of joint competence (federal and regional); (d) exercise of public control over local government bodies; (e) advancement of civil initiatives and elaboration of programs for the development of civil society.
Subject: Air & atmosphere, Environment gen., Land & soil, Water
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Decree No. 515 of the Cabinet of Ministers amending Decree No. 772 of the Cabinet of Ministers validating the Regulation on quality requirements, compliance assessment, and supervision over market of biofuel and information of the consumers.
Policy_Content: Item 1.19 shall be amended to add the following wording: “Gas filling stations must bear inscription “Biogas” on technological equipment of gas filling stations”.
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Northern Europe

Policy: Law No. 9791 amending and supplementing Law No. 9385 of 2005 on forests and the forestry service.
Policy_Content: This Law lays down several addenda and amendments to Law No. 9385 of 2005 on forestry and the forestry service. The amendments aim at the  implementation of the Kyoto Protocol. Specific provisions regard monitoring of forests, forest users’ associations rights and responsibilities as well as penalties to be applied in case of infringements.
Subject: Forestry
Keyword: Forest management/forest conservation,Forest service/forest officers,Forestry protection measures,Non-governmental entity,Offences/penalties
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, Mediterranean, Southern Europe

Policy: Ministerial Decree No. 471 amending Ministerial Decree No. 31 validating Regulation on state control over protection of atmospheric air.
Policy_Content: Paragraph 2 shall acquire a new wording: “This Regulation establishes the modalities of the organization and carrying out state control over protection of the atmospheric air by the Federal Ecological, Technological and Nuclear Supervision Service and its territorial bodies at the objects subject to federal ecological control; by the authorized regional environmental institutions at the objects of economic and other activity except for objects under federal state ecological supervision. Federal Ecological, Technological and Nuclear Supervision Service, its territorial bodies and other regional bodies of public authority in the sphere of environmental management shall cooperate with other federal executive bodies concerned, local self-government, public and other organizations, and also with citizens in the process of supervision, inspection and control over air quality.”
Subject: Air & atmosphere
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Ley Nº 29073 - Ley del artesano y del desarrollo de la actividad artesanal.
Policy_Content: La presente Ley del artesano y del desarrollo de la actividad artesanal, establece el régimen jurídico que reconoce al artesano como constructor de identidad y tradiciones culturales, preservando para ello la tradición artesanal en todas sus expresiones.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Keyword: Agricultural development,Cultural heritage,Extension,Community management,Traditional knowledge/indigenous knowledge,Tourism
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Acuerdo Nº 105 - Modifica el Acuerdo Nº 93, modificatorio del Acuerdo Nº 69, sobre comercialización de gas licuado de petróleo (GLP) a través de instalaciones centralizadas.
Policy_Content: El presente Acuerdo redefine el mecanismo de uso de cilindros de 15 kg de gas para los sectores industrial y comercial.
Subject: Energy
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Measures of Sichuan province for land use tax in cities and townships.
Policy_Content: These Measures, consisting of 13 Articles, are formulated to rationalize the use of land in cities and towns, to regulate the income differential on land, to improve efficient use of land and to strengthen land management.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, East Asian Seas, Eastern Asia, North Pacific, North-West Pacific
Entry into force notes: These Measures enter into force on 1 August 2007.

Policy: Decreto Legislativo Nº 992 - Regula el proceso de pérdida de dominio.
Policy_Content: El presente Decreto Legislativo regula el proceso de pérdida de dominio, que constituye en la extinción de los derechos y/o títulos de bienes de procedencia ilícita a favor del Estado sin compensación de naturaleza alguna.
Subject: Land & soil
Keyword: Land tenure,Ownership,Land reform,Expropriation,Transfer,Dispute settlement,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Ley Nº 29071 - Crea el Bono de Formalización Inmobiliaria (BFI).
Policy_Content: La presente Ley crea el Bono de Formalización Inmobiliaria (BFI), que consiste en la ayuda económica directa no reembolsable, otorgada por el Estado con criterio de utilidad pública, que se destinará exclusivamente para formalizar en el Registro de Predios de la Superintendencia Nacional de Registros Públicos (SUNARP), la declaratoria de edificación existente y su independización como unidad inmobiliaria.
Subject: Land & soil
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Order No. 188 validating the Regulation on forwarding of documented information registered in the state forest fund to the Federal Forest Agency.
Policy_Content: This Order establishes that documented information registered in the state forest fund shall be submitted by the regional forest institution to the Federal Forest Agency in accordance with Annexes 1-8. Documented information shall contain data on: (a) forest land and other categories of land with forest cover; (b) characteristics of forests by purposeful use thereof; (c) distribution of forests by density and growth class; (d) distribution of forests by species and age groups; (e) categories of protection forest; (f) calculated felling rate; (g) amount of forest management; (h) damages and destruction of forests; (i) reforestation and forest protection arrangements.
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Order No. 187 of the Ministry of Natural Resources validating the form of the state forest register.
Policy_Content: This Order establishes that the state forest register shall be composed of three sections: (a) forests and forest resources, composition of forest land, urban forests, categories of forests, including protection forests, exploitable forest and reserve forest, quantitative and qualitative characteristics of forests, calculated felling rate and data on forest damages and destruction of forests; (b) forest management, authorized forest uses and allotment of forests to natural and legal persons; and (c) conservation, protection of forests and reforestation.
Subject: Forestry
Geographical_area: Arctic, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, Black Sea, Caspian Sea, CIS (Commonwealth of Independent States), Eastern Europe, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, North Pacific, North-West Pacific

Policy: Prevention of Pollution of the Sea (Sewage) (Amendment) Regulations, 2007.
Policy_Content: These Regulations amend the Prevention of Pollution of the Sea (Sewage) Regulations, 2005 by inserting after regulation 12 in the First Schedule a new chapter on port State control.
Subject: Sea, Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Asia, ASIA AND THE PACIFIC, East Asian Seas, Small Island Developing States, South-Eastern Asia
Entry into force notes: These Regulations enter into force on 1 August 2007.

Policy: Thüringen Environmental Impact Assessment Law.
Policy_Content: The present Law implements the Directive 2001/42/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council on the assessment of the effects of certain plans and programmes on the environment. The purpose of the Law is to ensure that in certain private and public projects, as well as plans and programmes the impact on the environment is exhaustively investigated, described and assessed and its result be taken into due consideration. The text deals with the following issues: purposes, definition of terms, sphere of application, relation to other provisions, competent authorities for environmental impact assessment, competent authorities for certain installations and transitional provisions. Four Annexes are enclosed as follows: List of projects subject to the present Law (1); Criteria for the preliminary assessment in specific cases (2); List of plans and programmes subject to the present Law (3); Criteria for the preliminary assessment of specific cases within a strategic environment impact assessment (4).
Subject: Environment gen.
Geographical_area: Alps, Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, North Sea, North-East Atlantic, Western Europe

Policy: Real Decreto Nº 1.028/2007 - Regula la autorización de instalaciones de generación eléctrica en el mar territorial.
Policy_Content: El presente Real Decreto tiene por objeto la regulación de los procedimientos, así como la determinación de las condiciones y criterios que han de regir para la obtención de las autorizaciones y concesiones administrativas precisas para la construcción y ampliación de las instalaciones de generación de electricidad (parque eólico marino o instalación de generación eólica marina) que se encuentren ubicadas físicamente en el mar territorial.
Subject: Energy
Keyword: Energy conservation/energy production,Renewable energy,Deep sea bed,Transport/storage,Legal proceedings/administrative proceedings,Authorization/permit
Geographical_area: Europe, EUROPE AND CENTRAL ASIA, European Union Countries, Mediterranean, North Atlantic, North-East Atlantic, Southern Europe

Policy: Ley Nº 29064 - Ley de relanzamiento del Banco Agropecuario (AGROBANCO).
Policy_Content: La presente Ley de relanzamiento del Banco Agropecuario (AGROBANCO), establece las normas de adecuación y funcionamiento de AGROBANCO como una empresa integrante del sistema financiero nacional dedicada a financiar la producción en la agricultura, la ganadería, la acuicultura, la forestación y las actividades de transformación y comercialización de los productos del sector agropecuario.
Subject: Agricultural & rural development
Geographical_area: Amazonia, Americas, East Pacific, Latin America and the Caribbean, LATIN AMERICA AND THE CARIBBEAN FAO, South America, South-Eastern Pacific

Policy: Real Decreto Nº 1.030/2007 - Modifica el Real Decreto Nº 1.370/2006, Plan nacional de asignación de derechos de emisión de gases de efecto invernadero, 2008-2012.
Policy_Content: El presente Real Decreto modifica el Plan nacional de asignación de derechos de emisión de gases de efecto invernadero para el periodo 2008-2012 (PNA), en diversos aspectos relativos a su implementación.
Subject: Air & atmosphere
Keyword: International agreement-implementation,Climate change,Environmental planning,Emissions,Environmental fees/charges,Ozone layer,Air quality/air pollution,Pollution control,Environmental standards

Policy: Real Decreto Nº 1.031/2007 - Desarrolla el marco de participación en los mecanismos de flexibilidad del Protocolo de Kyoto.
Policy_Content: El presente Real Decreto tiene por objeto desarrollar el marco de participación en los mecanismos de flexibilidad regulados en el Protocolo de Kyoto al Convenio Marco de Naciones Unidas sobre el Cambio Climático, de conformidad con lo establecido en la Ley Nº 1/2005, de 9 de marzo, por la que se regula el régimen del comercio de derechos de emisión de gases de efecto invernadero.
Subject: Air & atmosphere
Keyword: Climate change,Environmental planning,Emissions,Environmental fees/charges,Ozone layer,Air quality/air pollution,Pollution control,Environmental standards,Institution,Clean development mechanism
